speaker: janitor
dialog: Another day at work I guess....

speaker: janitor
dialog: At least the view is beautiful. The Earth looks completely different from the pictures.

speaker: janitor
dialog: This is JANITOR 5-0 with Earth's SKY NET. I copy!

speaker: boss
dialog: You have multiple bogeys inbound with collision courses across California. You're the only Janitor in the area. You have the green light to intercept!

speaker: boss
dialog: But before you go make sure all your controls work. Try Moving your ship with the mouse cursor.

speaker: boss
dialog: Now try moving and holding the left mouse button to create your trail. This is how you'll destroy the debris. QUICK! Destroy that comet over there!

speaker: janitor
dialog: Got it! Everything seems to check out. This is JANITOR 5-0 on new heading 147. On course to intercept. ETA 2 minutes, over.

speaker: boss
dialog: Houston copies. Just make sure to not cause damage to the loaner starship. Good Luck out there JANITOR.
